phrases: Yes, please return home at once.
Did something happen to my grandma?
It was almost like a dream.
Why are not I waking up?
A Place Further Than the Universe
It is not too far, but we cannot get there via helicopter.
We finally get to take one!
We have to avoid crevasses and other dangerous places as we go.
We will be going one way, then have to alter course a bit...
You are the one always complaining about how annoying long hair is, are not you?
Please make sure to turn the tap off after doing laundry.
Well, it is better than when Takako used to cut it, at least...
That is why we are inviting you.
Could you give me time to think about it?
I thought she would be jumping at the chance...
The hole in the ozone layer was discovered during an expedition here,
and they were the first in the world to report it.
These weather balloons are released twice a day,
simultaneously, at places all over the world.
Shirase-san did not come, did she?
She probably needs time to be alone and think.
She has not had much to say since the captain made the offer...
This is the point where we lost communication.
The ridge snack station is back in business!
We finished our recording, so I thought...
It is pretty warm today, huh?
It seems a bit chilly for the middle of summer...
They launched a weather balloon earlier!
Could you see it from here?
I hear today's pick-me-up is anpan!
Kimari, your lack of planning is making this more complicated than it should be.
Why did you even say you would go talk to her?
I am not particularly depressed or stressed out about it.
I actually feel pretty normal, I guess...
I was convinced that when I arrived in Antarctica, I would start crying.
A Place Further Than the Universe Kobuchizawa Takako
These are the same sights my mother saw.
My mother was so moved by these sights.
This place is so wonderful, it is no wonder she wanted to come.
I thought that is what I would be thinking.
But that was not what I ended up thinking at all.
The most I could muster was Wow, it is just like in the pictures.
Is that why the first thing you said when we got here was in your face?
But you came here because your mother was waiting, did not you?
You wanted to come here because your mother was here, right?
That is why you asked Kanae-san over and over,
took all those jobs, worked so hard to get here...
You said that your mother was waiting for you here!
That is not a nice thing to say to Shirase-san...
It is like, why did I even come this far, then?
But... once we get there, there is nowhere left to go.
If I go, and nothing changes, I think...
I am going to spend the rest of my life feeling the way I do now.
I would like to talk for about thirty minutes about the civilian research projects
that will follow Challenge For Antarctic.
We just have a few simple words to say.
If you do not gobble it up fast, it will go cold in no time!
That is the thrill of the Antarctic barbecue.
Are you sure you do not want to say anything to her?
To act is not necessarily compassion.
True compassion sometimes comes from inaction!
But that is basically what we decided.
The ability to give each other space is the proof that you are good friends.
What the hell are you doing?!
Did she say we were good friends?
Are not you going to go?
You should know by now that I am not good in party situations.
If you have to ask me that, you probably should not go.
I may not want to believe it, but the fact is that Takako is dead.
I can talk about dying wishes and what she would have wanted,
but none of us know if that is how she really felt, if it is what she really wanted.
Then why did you come to Antarctica again?
Because I latched on to the idea that Takako wanted me to.
At the end of the day, those ideas we latch on to are not enough to motivate us.
But when we run around on the injustices of reality,
they are the only things that can break through,
make the impossible possible, and allow us to proceed on.
You are saying I should not leave it to anyone else?
That is how you have always done things, is not it?
I know I am being unreasonable!
Because... my mother is waiting there.
Apparently we are taking this on the trip inland!
And so, our final journey began.
To that place further than the reaches of the universe.
The place that seemed out of reach.
I thought we were taking the snowcat...
That is S-16, the departure point for the inland expedition.
Today's mission is loading materials onto the snowcats stationed there.
It is going to be a lot colder here than it was at Syowa Station, yeah.
This scenery is more like how you imagine Antarctica, right?
Well, have you got two sevens?
Have some sympathy for person who is lost three times straight...
We will be going outside, so get ready.
I have lost all feeling in my nose!
It is going to get colder as we get higher up.
Eat fast or it will get cold!
We are turning off the engines at night, right?
Yeah, we do not have enough fuel to keep it running.
Because none of us knows what is going to happen out there.
It is going to get very windy tonight,
so when moving between cars, make sure to use this rope.
Do not assume you will be fine because it is just a few meters.
If you end up out in a blizzard, you are never making it back.
It is called a sun pillar.
It is an optical illusion caused by ice crystals.
Did my mother see this, too?
You could say she gazed at it as she slept there.
As long as we stay in here...
This is your first time seeing a real one?
Was it like this when my mother went missing?
We think she left something at the inland station,
The next thing I knew, she was gone.
And moments later, a blizzard was raging.
No... I would been asleep, but I just woke up.
But I am not sure if I would have liked it if I were here by myself.
It is because I am here with you guys.
As long as I was with you guys, I would probably feel the same way about the Arctic.
Thanks to you, I got the most out of my youth.
I, who thought I would be fine by myself forever, now have friends.
They are all a little weird,
But I have friends who were willing to travel to Antarctica with me.
But they were willing to travel this far with me,
to this place where you were...
I was able to come this far because of them.
what can you see from where you are?
Will I be able to see the same sights that you saw?
I am going to be there soon...
Challenge For Antarctic 1st Team Observatory Site
It is been a while, huh?
Though we are going to keep you waiting a while yet, still...
Challenge For Antarctic 1st Team Observatory Site
We need to fix the foundation, build the building,
carry supplies piece by piece, create a telescope...
It is going to be a long time before the Kobuchizawa Observatory is finished...
We are not going to find any traces of my Mom.
The fact that no one's been here for three years makes it more likely that we will!
We are not going to find anything!
Anything at all... even one single piece!
Just making it here was enough.
I made it to the place my mother was.
You have come this far, that is why...
There has to be one piece of proof that your mother was here!
